text: Ablekuma North Parliament Election: The implication of NDC's Ewurabena Aubynn's win.
translated: Zaben Majalisar Dokokin Ablekuma ta Arewa: Sakamakon nasarar Ewurabena Aubynn na NDC.
backtranslated: Ablekuma North Assembly Election: Results of the victory of the NDC by Ewurabena Aubynn.

text: Asante Kotoko's game against Kwara United won't be a walkover – Sarfo Duku.
translated: Wasan Asante Kotoko da Kwara United ba zai zama tafiya ba  Sarfo Duku.
backtranslated: Asante Kotoko's match against Kwara United will not be a walk in Sarfo Duku.

text: At least 13 drown fleeing armed men in northwest Nigeria.
translated: Akalla mutane 13 sun nitse a cikin ruwa suna tserewa daga 'yan bindiga a arewa maso yammacin Najeriya.
backtranslated: At least 13 people drowned while fleeing gunmen in northwestern Nigeria.

text: Kumawu MP urges Parliament to act on crisis in Ghana’s prisons.
translated: Wani dan majalisar Kumawu ya bukaci majalisar da ta dauki mataki kan rikicin da ke faruwa a gidajen yarin Ghana.
backtranslated: A Kumawu MP has urged parliament to take action on the violence in Ghana's prisons.

text: Diddy declines to testify, praises judge as sex trafficking trial nears end.
translated: Diddy ya ki bayar da shaida, ya yaba wa alkali yayin da shari'ar cinikin jima'i ke gab da karewa.
backtranslated: Diddy refused to testify, praising the judge as the sex trafficking case was nearing completion.

text: 'Asibolanga' and all the 2022 beef songs that took the internet by storm.
translated: 'Asibolanga' da duk waƙoƙin naman shanu na 2022 da suka mamaye intanet da guguwa.
backtranslated: 'Asibolanga' and all the beef songs of 2022 have taken the internet by storm.

text: 'Act now before the situation deteriorates' – NDC Spain branch tells Mahama amid rising 'insecurity’.
translated: 'Ku yi aiki yanzu kafin yanayin ya tabarbare'  reshen NDC Spain ya gaya wa Mahama a yayin da ake samun 'rashin tsaro' .
backtranslated: 'Act now before the situation gets worse' NDC Spain branch told Mahama amidst the 'security crisis'.

text: Was Jose Mourinho right?: Unpacking the lows of Dele Alli’s football career.
translated: Shin Jose Mourinho ya yi daidai?: Bayyana abubuwan da suka faru a cikin wasan kwallon kafa na Dele Alli?
backtranslated: Is Jose Mourinho right?: Explaining the events of Dele Alli's football career?

text: Rema's Calm Down falls off Billboard Hot 100 after setting new record.
translated: Rema's Calm Down ya sauka daga Billboard Hot 100 bayan kafa sabon rikodin.
backtranslated: Rema's Calm Down has dropped off the Billboard Hot 100 after setting a new record.

text: 'I have always wanted a girl' - Rihanna opens up on pressure of raising two sons.
translated: 'A koyaushe ina son yarinya' - Rihanna ta buɗe game da matsin lamba na haɓaka 'ya'ya maza biyu.
backtranslated: 'I always wanted a girl' - Rihanna opened up about the pressures of raising two boys.

text: Adjusted level 2: Presido announce new restrictions for South Africa to contain Coronavirus.
translated: Mataki na 2: Presido ya sanar da sabbin takunkumi ga Afirka ta Kudu don hana cutar Coronavirus.
backtranslated: Step 2: Presido announces new restrictions for South Africa to prevent the spread of the Coronavirus.

text: 'What kind of nonsense is that?' - Prophet descends on GRNMA.
translated: 'Wane irin wauta ce wannan?' - Annabi ya sauka a GRNMA.
backtranslated: 'What kind of foolishness is this?' - Prophet landed on GRNMA.

text: 2023 AFCON: Ivory Coast Cote coach slams Nigeria for being overly defensive.
translated: 2023 AFCON: Kocin Ivory Coast Cote ya soki Najeriya saboda ta yi tsayayya da karfi.
backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: Ivory Coast coach Cote criticizes Nigeria for resisting the violence.

text: DKB and DJ Slim lock horns online.
translated: DKB da DJ Slim sun kulle ƙaho a kan layi.
backtranslated: DKB and DJ Slim have locked horns online.

text: Dr Apostle Amagashie warns men against popular lovemaking position, cites stroke risk.
translated: Dr Apostle Amagashie ya gargadi maza game da shahararren yanayin yin soyayya, yana ambaton haɗarin bugun jini.
backtranslated: Dr Apostle Amagashie warned men against the popular trend of dating, citing the risk of stroke.

text: Police arrest alleged serial motorbike thief.
translated: 'Yan sanda sun kama wani da ake zargi da satar babura.
backtranslated: The police arrested a suspect of stealing motorcycles.

text: FIFA imposes transfer ban on Hearts of Oak over unsettled $150,000 debt.
translated: FIFA ta hana Hearts of Oak canja wuri saboda bashin da ba a biya ba na $150,000.
backtranslated: Hearts of Oak's transfer was denied by FIFA due to unpaid debts of $150,000.

text: 'Mickey Mouse' boxer toasts Cape Verde's first Olympic medal.
translated: 'Mickey Mouse' dan dambe ya yi wa Cape Verde kyautar lambar yabo ta farko ta Olympics.
backtranslated: 'Mickey Mouse' boxer awarded Cape Verde its first Olympic medal.

text: APP leader reacts after court throws out injunction against Akwatia by-election.
translated: Shugaban jam'iyyar APP ya mayar da martani bayan kotu ta yi watsi da umarnin hana zaben Akwatia.
backtranslated: APP leader reacts after court dismisses Akwatia's election ban order

text: Igbo leader addresses land acquisition allegations, apologises to Ghanaians.
translated: Shugaban 'yan kabilar Igbo ya yi magana kan zargin mallakar ƙasa, ya nemi gafarar 'yan Ghana.
backtranslated: An Igbo tribal leader addressed the allegations of land ownership, apologizing to Ghanaians.

text: Bukom Arena gets face-lift to host Basketball games.
translated: Bukom Arena ya sami gyaran fuska don karɓar bakuncin wasannin Kwando.
backtranslated: Bukom Arena has undergone a facelift to host Basketball games.

text: Afenyo-Markin apologises to Prof Ayensu-Danquah over 'strangely, you get a ministerial appointment' comment.
translated: Afenyo-Markin ta nemi gafara ga Farfesa Ayensu-Danquah kan 'abin mamaki, kun sami nadin minista' tsokaci.
backtranslated: Afenyo-Markin apologized to Professor Ayensu-Danquah for the 'surprisingly, you got appointed minister' comment.

text: Asawa National Open Championship slated for June 19.
translated: An shirya gasar zakarun kasa ta Asawa a ranar 19 ga watan Yuni.
backtranslated: The Asawa National Championship is scheduled for June 19.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Kwaku Dawuro presents The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
translated: LIVE: Kwaku Dawuro ya gabatar da Shirin Harkar Siyasa na Safiya.
backtranslated: LIVE: Kwaku Dawuro hosted the Political Action Morning Show.

text: 'God willing, I will receive my Lamborghini; I have documents to prove it's mine’ - Shatta Wale.
translated: 'Da yardar Allah, zan karbi Lamborghini na; Ina da takardu don tabbatar da cewa nawa ne' - Shatta Wale.
backtranslated: 'By God's grace, I will get my Lamborghini; I have the documents to prove that it is mine' - Shatta Wale.

text: Helicopter Crash: Ibrahim Mahama offers to clear the debts of Dr Murtala, Alhaji Muniru.
translated: Hadarin Jirgin Sama: Ibrahim Mahama ya ba da damar share bashin Dr Murtala, Alhaji Muniru.
backtranslated: Air crash: Ibrahim Mahama offered to clear the debt of Dr Murtala, Alhaji Muniru.

text: Tennis legend Rafael Nadal to retire in November.
translated: Jarumin kwallon Tennis Rafael Nadal zai yi ritaya a watan Nuwamba.
backtranslated: Tennis star Rafael Nadal is set to retire in November.

text: Enforce maternity-friendly workplace policies - Samuel Atidzah.
translated: Ka aiwatar da manufofin wurin aiki na sada zumunci da uwaye - Samuel Atidzah.
backtranslated: Implement a mother-friendly workplace policy by Samuel Atidzah.

text: GEC Open returns to Ghana.
translated: GEC Open ya dawo Ghana.
backtranslated: The GEC Open is back in Ghana.

text: 'From dawn raid to helping with investigation to arraignment' - Azar calls out IGP over arrest of NPP activist.
translated: 'Daga faɗuwar rana zuwa taimakawa tare da bincike zuwa tuhuma' - Azar ya kira IGP kan kama wani dan gwagwarmayar NPP.
backtranslated: 'From sunset to help with investigation to interrogation' - Azar calls out IGP over arrest of NPP activist.

text: Home-based Ghana players seek more opportunities after good outing against South Africa.
translated: 'Yan wasan Ghana da ke gida suna neman karin dama bayan kyakkyawan fitar da Afirka ta Kudu.
backtranslated: Ghana's home players are looking for more chances after South Africa's impressive dismissal.

text: Akwatia By-Election: We cannot be intimidated - NPP’s Haruna Mohammed.
translated: Zaɓen Ranar Akwatia: Ba za a iya tsoratar da mu ba - Haruna Mohammed na NPP.
backtranslated: Choosing the day of Akwatia: We cannot be intimidated - Haruna Mohammed of NPP.

text: Some top Ghanaian musicians who ditched secular music for ministry.
translated: Wasu fitattun mawaƙa 'yan Ghana da suka yi watsi da waƙar duniya don hidima.
backtranslated: Some of the Ghanaian musicians who gave up the world of music for the ministry.

text: Joseph Awinongya Jr emerges as number 1 boxer in the USA in top 6 u-20 amateur boxers.
translated: Joseph Awinongya Jr ya fito a matsayin dan damben lamba 1 a Amurka a cikin manyan 'yan damben da ba su kai shekaru 20 ba.
backtranslated: Joseph Awinongya Jr emerged as the number 1 boxer in the United States among the top boxers under the age of 20.

text: Amenfi Central set for major road overhaul.
translated: An shirya cibiyar Amenfi don gyara babbar hanya.
backtranslated: Amenfi centre is planned to repair the highway.

text: Bui Power nets $64.
translated: Bui Power yana da dala 64.
backtranslated: The Bui Power is $64.

text: GCTU warns against defamatory publications, threatens legal action.
translated: GCTU ta yi gargadin a kan wallafe-wallafen da ke bata sunan mutane, tana barazanar daukar mataki a kotu.
backtranslated: The GCTU warned against defamatory publications, threatening legal action.

text: American porn star Nasir sends message to Shugatiti as ‘orgasm’ challenge delays.
translated: Tauraron batsa na Amurka Nasir ya aika da sako zuwa Shugatiti kamar yadda " kalubale na orgasm " ya jinkirta.
backtranslated: American porn star Nasir sent a message to Shugatiti as his "orgasm challenge" was delayed.

text: I won 'contentious' unannounced 2019 VGMA Artiste of the Year Award - Stonebwoy claims.
translated: Na ci 'rashin jayayya' wanda ba a sanar da shi ba na 2019 VGMA Artist of the Year Award - Stonebwoy da'awar.
backtranslated: I won the 'undisputed' unannounced 2019 VGMA Artist of the Year Award - Stonebwoy claimed.

text: Helicopter Crash: 'You have not won; Christ has' – Wife of Sergeant Mensah shames death.
translated: Hadarin Helicopter: 'Ba ku yi nasara ba; Kristi ya yi'  Matar Sarjan Mensah ta kunyata mutuwa.
backtranslated: Helicopter crash: 'You did not win; Christ did' Sergeant Mensah's wife is humiliated to death.

text: 'He took me in and mentored me' - Ofori Amponsah delivers a heartfelt tribute to Daddy Lumba.
translated: 'Ya karbe ni kuma ya jagoranci ni' - Ofori Amponsah ya ba da girmamawa ga Daddy Lumba.
backtranslated: 'He took me in and guided me' - Ofori Amponsah pays tribute to Daddy Lumba.

text: 'How can I enter a house with familiar spirits' - Appiah Danquah reacts to NPP's amnesty for members.
translated: 'Ta yaya zan shiga gidan da ke da ruhohi da aka sani' - Appiah Danquah ya mayar da martani ga afuwar da NPP ta yi wa mambobinta.
backtranslated: 'How can I enter a house with known ghosts' - Appiah Danquah responds to NPP's apology to its members.

text: High cholesterol can cause black toes and feet – Health expert.
translated: Babban cholesterol na iya haifar da yatsun kafa da ƙafa  Masanin kiwon lafiya.
backtranslated: High cholesterol can cause toe and foot pain.

text: Rev.
translated: Rev. (Mai Tsarki)
backtranslated: The Rev.

text: Ato Forson backs calls for fair deal on Africa's $1.
translated: Ato Forson ya goyi bayan kira don yin adalci a kan $ 1 na Afirka.
backtranslated: Ato Forson supported the call for justice on the African $1 note.

text: Homowo: Nii Okanta Ankrah II calls for unity, peace and teamwork.
translated: Homowo: Nii Okanta Ankrah II yana kira ga haɗin kai, zaman lafiya da aiki tare.
backtranslated: Homowo: Nii Okanta Ankrah II is a call for unity, peace and cooperation.

text: NPP would have still punished Akua Afriyie if she had won – Nana Akomea.
translated: NPP har yanzu da ta hukunta Akua Afriyie idan ta ci nasara  Nana Akomea.
backtranslated: The NPP would still have punished Akua Afriyie if it had won Nana Akomea.

text: A producer told me ‘Agya W’ahwe Me So’ was a terrible song with a horrible video – Rose Adjei.
translated: Wani mai shirya waƙar ya gaya mini cewa "Agya Wahwe Me So" waƙa ce mai ban tsoro da bidiyo mai ban tsoro  Rose Adjei.
backtranslated: A producer told me that "Agya Wahwe Me So" is a horror song and a horror film by Rose Adjei.

text: NDC grassroots demand answers over helicopter crash, suspect foul play.
translated: 'Yan jam'iyyar NDC na neman amsa kan hatsarin jirgin sama, suna zargin aikata laifi.
backtranslated: NDC members are seeking answers on the plane crash, alleging criminal activity.

text: Key takeaways from EOCO's statement on Shatta Wale's Lamborghini case.
translated: Muhimman abubuwan da aka samu daga bayanin EOCO kan shari'ar Lamborghini ta Shatta Wale.
backtranslated: Highlights from EOCO's commentary on the Lamborghini case by Shatta Wale.

text: FDA intercepts GH¢11.
translated: Hukumar Kula da Abinci ta hana GH11.
backtranslated: The Food and Drug Administration has banned GH11.

text: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Resolve outstanding issues to stem chaos!!.
translated: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Warware batutuwan da suka rage don dakatar da hargitsi !!.
backtranslated: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Solve the remaining issues to stop the chaos!!.

text: Sharp rise in fire injuries and deaths in first half of 2025 by 33%  – GNFS.
translated: Babban ƙaruwa a raunin da ya faru da gobara da mutuwar a farkon rabin shekarar 2025 da kashi 33%  GNFS.
backtranslated: A significant increase in fire-related injuries and deaths in the first half of 2025 by 33% GNFS.

text: Why we signed Mohammed Kudus – Tottenham coach Thomas Frank explains.
translated: Dalilin da ya sa muka sanya hannu kan Mohammed Kudus  Kocin Tottenham Thomas Frank ya bayyana.
backtranslated: Why we signed Mohammed Kudus Tottenham coach Thomas Frank explained.

text: 'I love women if you don't understand, go to hell' - Old video of Kofi Jumah resurfaces.
translated: 'Ina son mata idan ba ku fahimta ba, ku tafi jahannama' - Tsohon bidiyon Kofi Jumah ya sake bayyana.
backtranslated: 'I love women if you don't understand, you can go to hell' - Old Kofi Jumah video reappeared.

text: Islamic Banking: A financial game changer for all Ghanaians, not just Muslims.
translated: Bankin Musulunci: Mai canza wasan kudi ga dukkan 'yan Ghana, ba Musulmai kawai ba.
backtranslated: Islamic Banking: A game changer for all Ghanaians, not just Muslims.

text: Screen-Addiction Among Children: A note to parents.
translated: Yin Jaraba da Kwamfuta Tsakanin Yara: Abin da Za a Yi wa Iyaye.
backtranslated: Computer Addiction in Children: What Parents Can Do.

text: Why Fatawu Issahaku was not called up by Otto Addo – GFA explains.
translated: Dalilin da yasa Otto Addo  GFA bai kira Fatawu Issahaku ba ya bayyana.
backtranslated: The reason why Otto Addo GFA did not call Fatawu Issahaku is unclear.

text: Agradaa’s parents slam brother for locking out Angel Asiamah from property.
translated: Iyayen Agradaa sun soki dan uwansa saboda kulle Angel Asiamah daga dukiya.
backtranslated: Agradaa's parents criticized his cousin for locking Angel Asiamah out of the property.

text: Ablekuma North Rerun: Ayawaso North MP reacts to alleged journalist assault.
translated: Ablekuma North Rerun: Dan majalisar Ayawaso ta Arewa ya mayar da martani kan zargin da ake yi wa dan jarida.
backtranslated: Ablekuma North Rerun: Ayawaso North MP responded to the allegations against the journalist.

text: Ghana Armwrestling sends goodwill message to BECE, WASSCE candidates.
translated: Gasar kokawar hannu ta Ghana ta aika da sakon fatan alheri ga 'yan takarar BECE, WASSCE.
backtranslated: Ghana's national wrestling championship sent a message of good wishes to the BECE, WASSCE candidates.

text: Military officer’s wife begins attempt to break GWR for Longest Reading Aloud Marathon.
translated: Matar wani jami'in soja ta fara kokarin karya GWR don Marathon mafi tsawo.
backtranslated: The wife of an army officer first attempted to break the GWR for the longest Marathon.

text: Sammy Flex speaks after reassignment in Shatta Wale’s management.
translated: Sammy Flex ya yi magana bayan sake sanya shi a cikin gudanarwar Shatta Wale.
backtranslated: Sammy Flex speaks after being re-appointed to the Shatta Wale management.

text: Ghanaians shocked by death of President Mills.
translated: 'Yan Ghana sun yi mamakin mutuwar Shugaba Mills.
backtranslated: Ghanaians were shocked by the death of President Mills.

text: National Delegates Conference: NPP NEC set to reject petition from Akufo-Addo, Kufuor.
translated: Taron wakilai na kasa: NPP NEC ta shirya kin amincewa da takardar neman aiki daga Akufo-Addo, Kufuor.
backtranslated: National delegation meeting: NPP NEC is set to reject the application from Akufo-Addo, Kufuor.

text: Ghanaians must see the lessons we have learned - Dr Bawumia.
translated: Ya kamata 'yan Ghana su ga darussan da muka koya - Dr Bawumia.
backtranslated: Ghanaians should see the lessons we have learned - Dr Bawumia.

text: One dead in fire outbreak at uncompleted fuel station near Ejura.
translated: Mutum daya ya mutu a wani gobara da ta tashi a tashar mai da ba a kammala ba kusa da Ejura.
backtranslated: One person died in a fire that broke out at an unfinished gas station near Ejura.

text: 'Rubbish, on which road?' – Nigeria’s Formula 1 hosting bid sparks backlash on social media.
translated: 'Rubbish, a kan wace hanya?'  Fomula 1 na Najeriya na neman karɓar bakuncin ya haifar da mummunan sakamako a kan kafofin watsa labarun.
backtranslated: 'Rubbish, on which road?' Nigeria's Formula 1 bid to host has caused a backlash on social media.

text: 'My life changed after the accident' - McBrown speaks after arm surgery.
translated: 'Rayuwata ta canza bayan hatsarin' - McBrown yayi magana bayan aikin tiyata na hannu.
backtranslated: 'My life changed after the accident' - McBrown spoke after hand surgery.

text: Democracy Cup: Deputy EC boss calls for participation in curtain-raiser fixtures.
translated: Kofin Demokradiyya: Mataimakin shugaban EC ya bukaci shiga cikin kayan ado na labule.
backtranslated: Democracy Cup: EC vice president required to participate in a curtain-raiser.

text: FULL LIST: NPP approves 54 motions at 2025 Delegates Conference.
translated: FULL LIST: Jam'iyyar NPP ta amince da kuduri 54 a taron wakilai na 2025.
backtranslated: FULL LIST: The NPP party has approved 54 resolutions at the 2025 congress of deputies.

text: Four times Afia Schwar has been embroiled in legal battles.
translated: Sau hudu Afia Schwar ta shiga cikin fadace-fadace na shari'a.
backtranslated: Four times Afia Schwar was involved in legal battles.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Parliament debates Ablekuma North rerun violence.
translated: LIVE: Majalisar ta yi muhawara kan tashin hankali a Ablekuma North.
backtranslated: LIVE: Parliament debates the violence in Ablekuma North.

text: Appau-Klu denies allegations of land encroachment, abuse of power.
translated: Appau-Klu ya musanta zargin da ake masa na kutse a ƙasa, da kuma cin zarafin iko.
backtranslated: Appau-Klu denied the charges of illegal entry, and abuse of power.

text: Spotlight on Lumba's first 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom' album.
translated: Haskakawa akan kundin farko na Lumba 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom'.
backtranslated: The highlight on Lumba's first album 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom'.

text: KIA begins enforcing reintroduced COVID-19 measures.
translated: KIA ta fara aiwatar da matakan COVID-19 da aka sake gabatarwa.
backtranslated: KIA has started implementing the re-introduced COVID-19 measures.

text: BoG puts digital credit services under regulation to boost financial inclusion.
translated: BoG yana sanya sabis na bashi na dijital a ƙarƙashin tsari don haɓaka haɗakar kuɗi.
backtranslated: BoG is putting digital lending services under a framework to promote financial inclusion.

text: Fatau Dauda confident of Black Stars wins against Chad and Mali.
translated: Fatau Dauda mai amincewa da Black Stars ya yi nasara a kan Chadi da Mali.
backtranslated: For example David's Black Stars side won against Chad and Mali.

text: 'I am committed to continue the legacy of late Dr Murtala Mohammed' – Princess Naama.
translated: 'Na kuduri aniyar ci gaba da gadon marigayi Dr Murtala Mohammed'  Princess Naama.
backtranslated: 'I am determined to carry on the legacy of the late Dr Murtala Mohammed' Princess Naama.

text: Watch as M.
translated: Watch kamar yadda M.
backtranslated: Watch as M.

text: First cholera cases confirmed across three districts in the Ashanti Region.
translated: An tabbatar da bullar cutar kwalara a wasu gundumomi uku a yankin Ashanti.
backtranslated: Cholera outbreaks have been confirmed in three other districts in the Ashanti region.

text: GH¢20m Defamation Suit: Empress Gifty's lawyer confirms Agradaa seeks case transfer.
translated: GH¢20m Laifin Tsegumi: Lauyan Empress Gifty ya tabbatar da cewa Agradaa na neman a canja masa shari'ar.
backtranslated: GH¢20m Tsegumi case: Empress Gifty's lawyer confirms that Agradaa is seeking transfer of the case.

text: Mohammed Kudus shines with assist on Tottenham debut in Reading win.
translated: Mohammed Kudus ya haskaka tare da taimakawa a wasan farko na Tottenham a Reading nasara.
backtranslated: Mohammed Kudus shone with an assist in Tottenham's first game win at Reading.

text: Read full details of official brochure on 8 fallen heroes from tragic August 6 helicopter crash.
translated: Karanta cikakken bayani na littafin hukuma akan jarumai 8 da suka mutu daga mummunan hatsarin jirgin sama na 6 ga Agusta.
backtranslated: Read the official account of the 8 heroes who died in the tragic plane crash of August 6.

text: Kojo Barnni beats Torgah on sudden death to win 9th edition of Gold Fields PGA Championship.
translated: Kojo Barnni ya doke Torgah a kan mutuwar kwatsam don lashe gasar 9 na Gold Fields PGA Championship.
backtranslated: Kojo Barnni beat Torgah on sudden death to win the 9th edition of the Gold Fields PGA Championship.

text: 'He has taken all my happiness away' – Daddy Lumba's sister cries.
translated: 'Ya dauke min dukkan farin cikina'  'Yar'uwar Daddy Lumba tana kuka.
backtranslated: 'He took all my happiness away' Daddy Lumba's sister cries.

text: 'Nowhere does the law empower you to judge professorial titles' – Barker-Vormawor to GTEC.
translated: 'Babu inda doka ta ba ku ikon yanke hukunci game da taken farfesa'  Barker-Vormawor zuwa GTEC.
backtranslated: 'Nowhere does the law give you the right to judge the title of Professor' Barker-Vormawor to GTEC.

text: 'I love Stonebwoy; his talent is beyond the shores of Ghana' - Video of late Murtala resurfaces.
translated: 'Ina son Stonebwoy; baiwarsa ta wuce gabar tekun Ghana' - Bidiyon marigayi Murtala ya sake bayyana.
backtranslated: 'I love Stonebwoy; his talent has crossed the coast of Ghana' - Late Murtala's video reappears.

text: Trump says 11 killed in US strike on drug-carrying vessel from Venezuela.
translated: Trump ya ce mutane 11 sun mutu a wani hari da Amurka ta kai kan wani jirgin ruwa mai dauke da miyagun kwayoyi daga Venezuela.
backtranslated: Trump says 11 people were killed in a US attack on a Venezuelan drug ship.

text: Paul Adom-Otchere ordered to appear before Special Prosecutor over GACL audit deal.
translated: An umurci Paul Adom-Otchere ya bayyana a gaban Mai Shari'a na Musamman game da yarjejeniyar binciken GACL.
backtranslated: Paul Adom-Otchere was ordered to appear before the Special Prosecutor regarding the GACL investigation agreement.

text: Artistes who have sampled Daddy Lumba’s classic songs.
translated: Masu zane-zane da suka yi amfani da waƙoƙin Daddy Lumba.
backtranslated: Artists who have used Daddy Lumba's music.

text: Known NPP sympathizer like GBA pres shouldn’t be calling for Torkornoo to be reinstated — Kpebu.
translated: Sanannen mai goyon bayan NPP kamar GBA pres bai kamata ya nemi a dawo da Torkornoo ba  Kpebu.
backtranslated: A prominent NPP supporter like GBA pres should not seek the return of Torkornoo Kpebu.

text: Party stalwarts should act responsibly at polling stations – Prof Gyampo.
translated: Ya kamata 'yan jam'iyyar su yi aiki da hankali a rumfunan zabe  Farfesa Gyampo.
backtranslated: Party members should be careful in the polling stations of Prof. Gyampo.

text: National Cathedral audit uncovers massive financial irregularities – Kwakye Ofosu details.
translated: Binciken Cathedral na Kasa ya gano manyan rashin daidaito na kudi  Bayanin Kwakye Ofosu.
backtranslated: The National Cathedral Survey has found major financial irregularities in the Official Records.

text: How I convinced Omane Boamah to quit NPP for NDC – Ato Ahwoi.
translated: Yadda na shawo kan Omane Boamah ya bar NPP zuwa NDC  Ato Ahwoi.
backtranslated: How I defeated Omane Boamah left NPP to NDC Ato Ahwoi.

text: WAFCON 2024: Ghana ready to battle for bronze – Stella Nyamekye.
translated: WAFCON 2024: Ghana a shirye take ta yi gwagwarmaya don tagulla  Stella Nyamekye.
backtranslated: WAFCON 2024: Ghana is set to compete for the bronze medal Stella Nyamekye.

text: Sack all appointees who have left their jobs to campaign to replace you – Kwesi Pratt to Mahama.
translated: Ku kori duk wadanda aka nada wadanda suka bar aikinsu don yin kamfen don maye gurbin ku  Kwesi Pratt zuwa Mahama.
backtranslated: Fire all the appointees who left their jobs to campaign to replace Kwesi Pratt to the Mahama.

text: Prof Mills would be outraged with level of galamsey destruction, toxic politics – Charlotte Osei.
translated: Farfesa Mills zai yi fushi da matakin lalata galamsey, siyasa mai guba  Charlotte Osei.
backtranslated: Professor Mills would be outraged by the move to corrupt the late, toxic politician Charlotte Osei.

text: Local government minister swears in new board members for ILGS, LUSPA.
translated: Ministan karamar hukumar ya rantsar da sabbin mambobin kwamitin ILGS, LUSPA.
backtranslated: The local government minister swore in the new members of the ILGS board, LUSPA.

text: Farmers to receive $5,040 per tonne of cocoa for 2025/2026 season.
translated: Manoma za su sami dala 5,040 a kowace tan na koko don kakar 2025/2026.
backtranslated: Farmers will receive $5,040 per ton of cocoa for the 2025/2026 season.

text: Obofour and Agradaa must settle their beef in court instead of social media – Onegod.
translated: Obofour da Agradaa dole ne su sasanta rikicin su a kotu maimakon kafofin sada zumunta  Onegod.
backtranslated: Obofour and Agradaa had to settle their dispute in court instead of social media Onegod.

text: There are over 100,000 people living with and spreading HIV without knowing it - AIDS Commission boss.
translated: Akwai mutane sama da 100,000 da ke rayuwa tare da kuma yada kwayar cutar HIV ba tare da sanin hakan ba - Shugaban Hukumar AIDS.
backtranslated: There are over 100,000 people living with and spreading HIV without knowing it - Director of the AIDS Foundation.

text: Use COVID-19 fund to strengthen health care, immunization financing — HFFG.
translated: Yi amfani da asusun COVID-19 don ƙarfafa kiwon lafiya, tallafin rigakafi  HFFG.
backtranslated: Use the COVID-19 fund to promote health, HFFG vaccine support.

text: 2022 most controversial celebrities.
translated: 2022 shahararrun mutane masu rikitarwa.
backtranslated: 2022 controversial celebrities and personalities.

text: Awutu Senya East MCE kick-starts fix all potholes in Kasoa.
translated: Awutu Senya East MCE kick-starts gyara duk ramuka a Kasoa.
backtranslated: Goat Senya East MCE kick-starts fixing all the holes in the Kasoa.

text: 'My house was attacked after I prophesied Mahama's win in 2024 Election' - Prophet Worlasi.
translated: 'An kai hari a gidana bayan na yi annabcin nasarar Mahama a Zaben 2024' - Annabi Worlasi.
backtranslated: 'My house was attacked after I predicted Mahama's victory in the 2024 Election' - Prophet Worlasi.

text: 2019 Asante Akyem Marathon set for April 22.
translated: An shirya gasar tseren marathon ta Asante Akyem ta 2019 a ranar 22 ga Afrilu.
backtranslated: The 2019 Asante Akyem marathon is scheduled for April 22.

text: Daddy Lumba's one-week observation in jeopardy?.
translated: Kulawar mako guda na Daddy Lumba a cikin haɗari?
backtranslated: A week-long Daddy Lumba's care in danger?

text: Ghanaian artiste Kay9ice composes ‘Mind Games’ to celebrate Davido, Chioma.
translated: Mawakiyar Ghana Kay9ice ta hada  Wasannin Zuciya  don bikin Davido, Chioma.
backtranslated: Ghanaian singer Kay9ice composed the song Heart Games for the Davido, Chioma festival.

text: National Functional Sports League to hold two-day competition.
translated: Ƙungiyar Wasannin Wasannin Wasanni ta Ƙasa za ta gudanar da gasar kwana biyu.
backtranslated: The National Association of Sports will host the two-day competition.

text: Father threatens legal action against popular SHS for alleged negligence.
translated: Mahaifin ya yi barazanar daukar matakin shari'a a kan shahararren SHS saboda zargin sakaci.
backtranslated: The father threatened legal action against the famous SHS for alleged negligence.

text: CID Director General sworn in as a board member of Small Arms Commission.
translated: Babban Daraktan CID ya rantsar da shi a matsayin memba na kwamitin Hukumar Kula da Kayan Aiki.
backtranslated: He was sworn in as a member of the board of the CID by the Director General.

text: Is Daddy Lumba dead or alive? - What we know so far.
translated: Daddy Lumba ya mutu ko yana da rai?
backtranslated: Daddy Lumba is dead or alive?

text: Ghana urgently needs a pricing regulatory authority to stabilise the economy.
translated: Ghana na bukatar hukumar kula da farashin kayayyaki da gaggawa don daidaita tattalin arzikinta.
backtranslated: Ghana urgently needs a price control agency to stabilize its economy.

text: Coronavirus: Africa needs US$285 billion to fight off pandemic impact - IMF.
translated: Coronavirus: Afirka na bukatar dalar Amurka biliyan 285 don magance tasirin cutar - IMF.
backtranslated: Coronavirus: Africa needs US$285 billion to counter the impact of the pandemic - IMF.

text: Why NPP and NDC are responsible for the  poor state of sports - Dan Kwaku Yeboah explains.
translated: Dalilin da ya sa NPP da NDC ke da alhakin mummunan yanayin wasanni - Dan Kwaku Yeboah ya bayyana.
backtranslated: Why NPP and NDC are responsible for the poor state of the game - Dan Kwaku Yeboah explained.

text: 2 dead as police engage in a shootout with highway robbery gang.
translated: Mutane biyu sun mutu yayin da 'yan sanda suka shiga harbi da' yan fashi a kan hanya.
backtranslated: Two people were killed when police engaged in a shootout with bandits on the road.

text: I’m now focused on returning to athletics - Martha Bissah.
translated: Yanzu na mayar da hankali kan komawa wasan motsa jiki - Martha Bissah.
backtranslated: Now I am focused on getting back into gymnastics - Martha Bissah.

text: Ghana's Abrefa wins medals at London Table Tennis Grand Prix.
translated: Abrefa na Ghana ya lashe lambobin yabo a gasar Grand Prix ta London.
backtranslated: Ghanaian Abrefa won medals at the London Grand Prix.

text: Woman flees from marriage after several death threats from husband.
translated: Wata mata ta gudu daga aure bayan barazanar kisa da yawa daga mijin.
backtranslated: One woman fled her marriage after receiving death threats from her husband.

text: Pure FM studio burnt to ashes.
translated: Gidan rediyo na FM ya ƙone ya zama toka.
backtranslated: The FM radio station burned to the ground.

text: IET Ghana mourns victims of helicopter crash.
translated: IET Ghana na alhinin wadanda hatsarin jirgin sama ya rutsa da su.
backtranslated: IET Ghana is mourning the victims of the plane crash.

text: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC reminds me of David killing Uriah for his wife' - Dr Okoe Boye.
translated: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC na tunatar da ni game da Dauda da ya kashe Uriya don matarsa' - Dr Okoe Boye.
backtranslated: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC reminds me of David who killed Uriah for his wife' - Dr Okoe Boye.

text: Any police officer sent to Akwatia by-election without a weapon is at risk – Okoe Boye warns.
translated: Duk wani jami'in 'yan sanda da aka tura zuwa zaben Akwatia ba tare da makami ba yana cikin hadari  Okoe Boye ya yi gargadin.
backtranslated: Any police officer deployed to Akwatia elections without weapons is at risk warns Okoe Boye.

text: Chelsea players 'brag' about teams they want to face ahead of Champions League draw.
translated: 'Yan wasan Chelsea suna 'fariya' game da kungiyoyin da suke son fuskanta kafin buga gasar zakarun Turai.
backtranslated: Chelsea players 'boast' about the teams they like to face before playing in the Champions League.

text: Safe Water Network commissions over $800,000 Asikuma Home Water Station.
translated: Kamfanin samar da ruwa mai tsafta ya ba da kwamitocin sama da dala 800,000 ga tashar ruwa ta gida ta Asikuma.
backtranslated: The clean water company gave over $800,000 in commissions to the local Asikuma water station.

text: 'Thank you Ablekuma North, together we made history!' - Ewurabena Aubynn after rerun victory.
translated: 'Na gode Ablekuma Arewa, tare mun yi tarihi!' - Ewurabena Aubynn bayan nasarar sake gudu.
backtranslated: 'Thank you Ablekuma Arewa, together we have made history!' - Eubena Aubynn after winning the second run.

text: Kwabena Poku wins 7th Captain One Major championship.
translated: Kwabena Poku ya lashe gasar zakarun Captain One Major karo na 7.
backtranslated: Kwabena Poku won the Captain One Major Championship for the 7th time.

text: PDP zone 2027 presidential candidate to south, five key takeaways from critical NEC meeting.
translated: PDP yankin 2027 dan takarar shugaban kasa zuwa kudu, manyan abubuwa guda biyar daga taron NEC mai mahimmanci.
backtranslated: PDP regional 2027 presidential candidate to the south, the top five items from the key NEC meeting.

text: Fugitive wanted over Australia police killings being helped, police say.
translated: 'Yan sanda sun ce ana neman wanda ya tsere daga Australia saboda 'yan sanda sun taimaka masa ya kashe mutane.
backtranslated: Police said a fugitive from Australia was wanted for helping police kill people.

text: Reks Brobby to serve on technical committee for 14th African Games.
translated: Reks Brobby zai yi aiki a kwamitin fasaha na wasannin Afirka na 14.
backtranslated: Reks Brobby will serve on the technical committee of the 14th African Games.

text: Watch when Usain Bolt showed how fast he is against regular, everyday people.
translated: Kalli lokacin da Usain Bolt ya nuna yadda yake da sauri a kan talakawa, mutane na yau da kullum.
backtranslated: Watch as Usain Bolt demonstrates how fast he is against ordinary, everyday people.

text: Lifestyle: Tactics for successful career branding.
translated: Salon rayuwa: Dabaru don cin nasarar sana'a.
backtranslated: Lifestyle: Strategies for a successful career.

text: 'I was made for this' - Bawumia as he leads Africa’s digital agenda at Cambridge.
translated: 'An halicce ni don wannan' - Bawumia yayin da yake jagorantar shirin dijital na Afirka a Cambridge.
backtranslated: 'I was made for this' - Bawumia while leading a digital Africa programme in Cambridge.

text: Salaga-South MP distributes 650 bags of fertiliser to constituents to boost farming.
translated: Dan majalisar Salaga-ta Kudu ya rarraba buhunan takin zamani 650 ga mazabu domin bunkasa aikin noma.
backtranslated: The South Salaga MP distributed 650 bags of fertilizer to the constituents to boost agriculture.

text: Speaker Bagbin ‘in ruthless pain’ over fatal helicopter crash.
translated: Mai magana da yawun Bagbin "a cikin matsanancin ciwo" a kan hatsarin jirgin sama mai saukar ungulu.
backtranslated: Bagbin's spokesperson "in extreme pain" over the helicopter crash.

text: Crackdown on Fake Titles: We must move from 'title worship' to performance - Prof Bokpin.
translated: Matsalar Takardun Takardun: Dole ne mu matsa daga 'bautar lakabi' zuwa wasan kwaikwayon - Farfesa Bokpin.
backtranslated: The Paper Problem: We have to move from 'title worship' to the drama - Professor Bokpin.

text: Paul Bongo releases 'This Party'.
translated: Paul Bongo ya saki 'Wannan Jam'iyyar'.
backtranslated: Paul Bongo released 'This Party'.

text: Year in Review: Greatest showbiz scandals of 2023.
translated: Shekara a cikin Bincike: Babban abin kunya na wasan kwaikwayo na 2023.
backtranslated: A Year in Search: The biggest comedy scandal of 2023.

text: 'I spent over $15,000 on my TGMAs performance' - Fameye.
translated: 'Na kashe sama da $ 15,000 a wasan kwaikwayon na TGMAs' - Fameye.
backtranslated: 'I spent over $15,000 on the show for the TGMAs' - Fameye.

text: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria reach final after edging South Africa on penalties.
translated: 2023 AFCON: Najeriya ta kai wasan karshe bayan ta doke Afirka ta Kudu a bugun daga.
backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria reach the final after beating South Africa in the play-offs.

text: Nkwanta North records first Mpox case - District Health Director.
translated: Nkwanta North ya rubuta shari'ar Mpox ta farko - Daraktan Kiwon Lafiya na Gunduma.
backtranslated: Nkwanta North wrote the first Mpox case - the District Health Director.

text: 'Calculated attempt to divide us' – Appiagyei slams move to replace Afenyo-Markin at ECOWAS Parliament.
translated: 'Yunkurin da aka yi na raba mu'  Appiagyei ya yi watsi da yunkurin maye gurbin Afenyo-Markin a Majalisar ECOWAS.
backtranslated: 'Attempts to divide us' Appiagyei has rejected the bid to replace Afenyo-Markin in the ECOWAS Council.

text: Ridge Hospital: One arrested in connection with assault on health workers.
translated: Asibitin Ridge: An kama mutum daya dangane da kai hari ga ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya.
backtranslated: Ridge Hospital: One man arrested in connection with assault on health workers.

text: R2Bees storm Accra Technical University on July 18 for WatsUp on campus.
translated: R2Bees sun mamaye Jami'ar Fasaha ta Accra a ranar 18 ga Yuli don WatsUp a harabar.
backtranslated: R2Bees invaded Accra University of Technology on 18 July for a WatsUp on campus.

text: Bawku SHS shut down after the fatal shooting of a final-year student.
translated: An rufe makarantar 'yan makaranta ta Bawku bayan harbin da aka yi wa dalibi a shekararsa ta karshe.
backtranslated: Bawku boarding school was closed after a student was shot in his last year.

text: Pharmaceutical distributor fined GH¢1.
translated: Mai rarraba magunguna ya ci tarar GH¢1.
backtranslated: The drug dealer was fined GH¢1.

text: How can Partey rape one woman three times? – Kankam Boadu questions charges.
translated: Ta yaya Partey zai yiwa mace daya fyade sau uku?  Kankam Boadu ya yi tambaya game da tuhumar.
backtranslated: How could Partey rape the same woman three times?

text: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Tons of commendations for Appiatse’s rebirth.
translated: Editorial na Ghanaian Times: Tons na yabo ga sake haihuwar Appiatsey.
backtranslated: Editorial of Ghanaian Times: Tons of praise for the rebirth of Appiatsey.

text: 'I was persecuted' - ACP Agordzo gives blow-by-blow account on alleged coup trial.
translated: "An tsananta min" - ACP Agordzo ya ba da labarin abin da ya faru a kan zargin da ake yi na juyin mulki.
backtranslated: "I was persecuted" - ACP Agordzo narrates the incident of the alleged coup.

text: Prof Ransford Gyampo reveals why he accepted Mahama's call to serve after several offers.
translated: Farfesa Ransford Gyampo ya bayyana dalilin da ya sa ya karbi kiran Mahama don yin aiki bayan da aka ba da dama.
backtranslated: Professor Ransford Gyampo explained why he accepted Mahama's call to action after being offered the opportunity.

text: Bankrogya community isolated by floodwaters, cries for basic infrastructure.
translated: Bankrogya al'umma ware da ambaliyar ruwa, kuka ga asali kayayyakin more rayuwa.
backtranslated: Bankrogya community was isolated by floods, you saw the basic infrastructure.

text: Uganda in talks to import all its oil via Tanzania.
translated: Uganda tana tattaunawa don shigo da duk man fetur ta hanyar Tanzania.
backtranslated: Uganda is in talks to import all its oil through Tanzania.

text: Movement for Change shuts down NPP comeback claims.
translated: Movement for Change ya rufe NPP da'awar dawowa.
backtranslated: Movement for Change has covered NPP's comeback claim.

text: Frimpong-Manso Institute mourns victims of devastating helicopter crash.
translated: Cibiyar Frimpong-Manso tana alhinin wadanda suka mutu a hadarin jirgin sama mai saukar ungulu.
backtranslated: The Frimpong-Manso Institute mourns the loss of lives in the helicopter crash.

text: You are sick if you have protruding stomach - Dr Dominic Nitiwul.
translated: Ba ku da lafiya idan kuna da ciki mai tsayi - Dokta Dominic Nitiwul.
backtranslated: You are not healthy if you have a long pregnancy. - Dr. Dominic Nitiwul.

text: Alhaji Grusah drops match fixing allegations claims against Dreams FC.
translated: Alhaji Grusah ya fadi game da zargin da ake yi game da Dreams FC.
backtranslated: Alhaji Grusah has spoken out against the allegations against Dreams FC.

text: Ghanaians urged to resolve disputes peacefully.
translated: An bukaci 'yan Ghana da su magance rikice-rikice cikin lumana.
backtranslated: Ghanaians were urged to resolve conflicts peacefully.

text: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad star at 2024 Tebel All Ghana Badminton Championship.
translated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad tauraruwa a gasar 2024 ta Tebel All Ghana Badminton Championship.
backtranslated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad is the star of the 2024 edition of the Tebel All Ghana Badminton Championship.

text: Why was Kevin Taylor's arrest warrant not enforced?.
translated: Me ya sa ba a aiwatar da umarnin kama Kevin Taylor ba?
backtranslated: Why hasn't an arrest warrant been executed for Kevin Taylor?

text: Rejected by their stepfather at 9, he and his twin turned to eating leftovers, sleeping in the cold.
translated: Mahaifinsa ya ƙi shi sa'ad da yake ɗan shekara tara, shi da tagwayensa suka soma cin abincin da ya rage, suna barci cikin sanyi.
backtranslated: Abandoned by his father when he was nine years old, he and his twin brother, who were both deaf, slept in the cold and ate leftovers.

text: Serve funeral guests according to their donations - Lower Axim Traditional Council directs.
translated: Ku yi wa baƙi jana'iza bisa ga gudummawarsu - Majalisar Gargajiya ta Lower Axim ta umurta.
backtranslated: Funeral the guests according to their contributions - ordered by the Lower Axim Traditional Council.

text: Ghanaian men do not know how to make love - Delkie claims.
translated: Maza 'yan Ghana ba su san yadda ake yin soyayya ba - in ji Delkie.
backtranslated: Ghanaian men don't know how to make love", says Delkie.

text: COVID-19: Mass vaccination ahead of Christmas begins December 14-18 - GHS.
translated: COVID-19: Alurar riga kafi a gaban Kirsimeti ya fara Disamba 14-18 - GHS.
backtranslated: COVID-19: Vaccination ahead of Christmas starts from 14-18 December - GHS.

text: Accra Mayor pledges Hockey support.
translated: Magajin garin Accra ya yi alkawarin tallafawa wasan hockey.
backtranslated: The mayor of Accra has pledged to support hockey.

text: COVID-19: All set for second dose vaccination in Ashanti Region.
translated: COVID-19: Duk an shirya don allurar rigakafin kashi na biyu a Yankin Ashanti.
backtranslated: COVID-19: All set for second dose vaccination in Ashanti Region.

text: Peace Council condemns violence at Ablekuma North, calls for calm.
translated: Majalisar zaman lafiya ta yi Allah wadai da tashin hankali a Ablekuma ta Arewa, tana kira da a kwantar da hankula.
backtranslated: The Security Council condemned the violence in North Ablekuma, calling for calm.

text: Nigeria's Maduka Okoye banned two months for match fixing.
translated: An dakatar da Maduka Okoye na Najeriya na tsawon watanni biyu saboda shirya wasa.
backtranslated: Nigerian Maduka Okoye was suspended for two months for match fixing.

text: EL calls for peace with DopeNation after years of misunderstanding.
translated: EL ya yi kira da a yi zaman lafiya da DopeNation bayan shekaru da rashin fahimta.
backtranslated: EL called for peace with DopeNation after years of misunderstanding.

text: Staff raise 'alarm' over deplorable state of Janga Technical School infrastructure.
translated: Ma'aikata sun yi 'gargadi' kan mummunan yanayin kayayyakin aikin Makarantar Fasaha ta Janga.
backtranslated: The staff has 'warned' of the dire condition of the facilities of the Janga Technical School.

text: Elders of Djetsorkope present newly installed chief to Osudoku Traditional Council.
translated: Dattawan Djetsorkope sun gabatar da sabon shugaban da aka kafa a Majalisar Gargajiya ta Osudoku.
backtranslated: The elders of Djetsorkope introduced the newly appointed head of the Osudoku Traditional Council.

text: We are aiming to win bronze medal against Senegal - Sudan coach Kwesi Appiah.
translated: Muna da burin lashe lambar tagulla a kan Senegal - Kocin Sudan Kwesi Appiah.
backtranslated: We are aiming to win the bronze medal against Senegal - Sudan coach Kwesi Appiah.

text: Kudus, Semenyo make official EPL Team of the Week after impressive opening week.
translated: Kudus, Semenyo ya zama jami'in EPL Team of the Week bayan mako na farko mai ban sha'awa.
backtranslated: Kudus, Semenyo became the official EPL Team of the Week after an impressive first week.

text: Sofo Azorka should have been arrested by the police – Nana Boakye.
translated: Sofo Azorka ya kamata 'yan sanda su kama shi  Nana Boakye.
backtranslated: Sofo Azorka should have been arrested by the police Nana Boakye.

text: Throwback Thursday: Spotlight on Daasebre Dwamena.
translated: Ranar Alhamis ta baya: Haske akan Daasebre Dwamena.
backtranslated: Last Thursday: The light on the Daasebre Dwamena.

text: 2022 In Review: Celebrity weddings that made waves.
translated: 2022 A cikin Bita: Bikin aure na shahararrun da suka yi raƙuman ruwa.
backtranslated: 2022 In Review: Celebrity weddings that have been surfing.

text: FLASHBACK: Watch as NDC member threatens, curses Hawa Koomson over 2024 election violence.
translated: Kallon yadda memba na NDC ya yi barazana, ya la'anci Hawa Koomson kan tashin hankali na zaben 2024.
backtranslated: Watching how the NDC member threatened, he condemned Hawa Koomson over the violence of the 2024 elections.

text: Ballon D’Or 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang lead nominees for best young player awards.
translated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang sun jagoranci masu gabatarwa don kyaututtukan mafi kyawun matasan 'yan wasa.
backtranslated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang lead the presenters for the best young player awards.

text: Why January is generally an economically difficult month.
translated: Me ya sa Janairu yawanci wata ne mai wahalar tattalin arziki.
backtranslated: Why is January usually an economically difficult month?

text: Meet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, new Director-General of CID trailblazing law enforcement and legal advocacy.
translated: Ku sadu da DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, sabuwar Darakta Janar na CID mai ba da doka da doka da kuma shari'a.
backtranslated: Meet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, the newly appointed Director General of CID for law enforcement and justice.

text: It was a childish decision - Obiri Boahen slams NPP for disbanding vigilante groups.
translated: Wannan yanke shawara ce ta yara - Obiri Boahen ya soki NPP don rushe kungiyoyin masu zaman kansu.
backtranslated: This is a childish decision - Obiri Boahen criticized the NPP for dismantling the NGOs.

text: Helicopter Crash: Ghana has lost a potential president in Omane Boamah – Ebo Whyte.
translated: Hadarin Jirgin Sama: Ghana ta rasa wani shugaban kasa a Oman Boamah  Ebo Whyte.
backtranslated: Air crash: Ghana lost a former president in Oman Boamah Ebo Whyte.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Kwaku Dawuro presents The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
translated: LIVE: Kwaku Dawuro ya gabatar da Shirin Harkar Siyasa na Safiya.
backtranslated: LIVE: Kwaku Dawuro hosted the Political Action Morning Show.

text: I don't mind if Ghanaians want to vote a president for more than two terms – Freddie Blay.
translated: Ba na damu ba idan 'yan Ghana suna son zabar shugaban kasa fiye da wa'adi biyu  Freddie Blay.
backtranslated: I don't care if Ghanaians want to elect a president for more than two terms Freddie Blay.

text: Students Loan Trust Fund warns against unauthorised use of Logo on billboards.
translated: Asusun Amintaccen Asusun Ba da Lamuni na Dalibai ya yi gargadin game da amfani da tambarin ba tare da izini ba a allon talla.
backtranslated: The Student Loans Trust Fund warns against unauthorized use of the logo on billboards.

text: South African influencer apologises over viral Russian job videos.
translated: Mai tasiri na Afirka ta Kudu ya nemi gafara kan bidiyo na aikin Rasha da ke yaduwa.
backtranslated: South African influencer apologizes for Russian spy video that goes viral.

text: Full list of award winners at the 2023 AFCON.
translated: Cikakken jerin wadanda suka lashe kyautar a gasar AFCON ta 2023.
backtranslated: The full list of the winners of the 2023 AFCON.

text: Daddy Lumba's 'Yentie Obiaa' helped me through money ritual allegations - LilWin.
translated: Daddy Lumba's 'Yentie Obiaa' ya taimaka min ta hanyar zargin al'adun kudi - LilWin.
backtranslated: Daddy Lumba's 'Yentie Obiaa' has helped me by criticizing the financial culture - LilWin.

text: Meet Benedicta Kwartemaa: The OKESS sprinting princess.
translated: Ku sadu da Benedicta Kwartemaa: Yarima mai tsere na OKESS.
backtranslated: Meet Benedicta Kwartemaa: The racing Princess of OKESS.

text: Ex-convict teacher jailed 48 years for defiling 7-year-old girl.
translated: An yanke wa wani tsohon malami hukuncin daurin shekara 48 a gidan yari saboda lalata yarinya 'yar shekara bakwai.
backtranslated: A former teacher is sentenced to 48 years in prison for molesting a seven-year-old girl.

text: Highlights of Dr Bawumia's electrifying speech after filing his nomination.
translated: Muhimman bayanai na jawabin Dr Bawumia bayan ya gabatar da takararsa.
backtranslated: Highlights of Dr Bawumia's speech after presenting his thesis.

text: Hearts of Oak coach Didi Dramani stresses determination to bring ‘sustainability and success' to the club.
translated: Kocin Hearts of Oak Didi Dramani ya jaddada aniyar kawo " dorewa da nasara " ga kungiyar.
backtranslated: Hearts of Oak coach Didi Dramani stressed the commitment to bring "sustainability and success" to the club.

text: Events that shocked the nation in 2020.
translated: Abubuwan da suka girgiza al'ummar a shekarar 2020.
backtranslated: Events that shook the nation in 2020.

text: Sports minister halts unlawful development of parts of Borteyman sports complex.
translated: Ministan wasanni ya dakatar da ci gaban haramtacciyar sassan wasan motsa jiki na Borteyman.
backtranslated: The sports minister suspended the development of Borteyman's banned sports sections.

text: Exiled Across the Ocean: How the British banished Agyemang Prempeh I and his chiefs to Seychelles.
translated: An yi hijira a ƙetaren Tekun: Yadda Birtaniyya ta kori Agyemang Prempeh I da shugabannin sa zuwa Seychelles.
backtranslated: Exiled across the Ocean: How the British expelled Agyemang Prempeh I and his chiefs to the Seychelles.

text: Health Minister lays Ghana Medical Trust Fund Bill before Parliament.
translated: Ministan Lafiya ya gabatar da kudurin Asusun Amintattun Likitocin Ghana a gaban Majalisar.
backtranslated: The Minister of Health has introduced the Ghana Medical Trust Fund Bill before the Parliament.

text: Ghanaians can travel to these 4 countries without visas after Parliament's ratification.
translated: 'Yan Ghana za su iya tafiya zuwa wadannan kasashe 4 ba tare da biza ba bayan amincewar majalisar.
backtranslated: Ghanaians can travel to these 4 countries without a visa after parliamentary approval.

text: Watch Joseph Paintsil’s goal in LA Galaxy’s 4-0 win over Santos Laguna.
translated: Kalli kwallo da Joseph Paintsil ya ci a wasan da LA Galaxy ta ci Santos Laguna da ci 4-0.
backtranslated: Watch the goal scored by Joseph Paintsil in the LA Galaxy's 4-0 win over Santos Laguna.
